name: Esper
description: You are an esper, capable of accessing the hidden powers of the human mind.

name: Esper Legacy
description: One of your ancestors received noetic treatments during the Hyperspace Era and that legacy has been passed down to youâ€¦but the powers have not.  Perhaps one of your relatives does, or perhaps they do not, but you were raised with the knowledge that it was always a possibility and to avoid receiving any genetech treatments that could damage your family's esper powers.

name: Esper Advancement
description: This is the trait for the Esper scenario that lets them advance.  It exists to have a different description than Esper Legacy and is not visible during gameplay.

name: Electrokinesis
description: The ability to control electricity with your mind.

name: Telekinesis
description: The ability to move objects without touching them.

name: Telepathy
description: The ability to read thoughts and influence others' minds.
